title: Taela
description: A little adventure was all Taela wanted to relieve some of the predictability of her life. When she heard a rumor that the king's city would be attacked, she set out to investigate, bringing her sister along with her. But things did not go as she had hoped. Her sister was captured and in order to attempt a rescue, Taela had to reveal a closely guarded secret involving the crystal she wears. She was quickly learning that her life was about to become anything but predictable.
author: Kacie Taylor
